channel.title: Posts on WHISTLER.PAGE
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on WHISTLER.PAGE

item.title: Returning from the Crypt of the Past...
item.description: What are you doing now? I just put up an old story I made ages ago, or more specifically two parts of. RCP is something I intend to make into a bit of a horror story, but progress is somewhat slow! I’d know, since it stalled for a year, but now I’m working on it again. I’ve wanted to pull it out of the freezer for a while now, but my past self just had to generate it with Microsoft Word.

item.title: The Modern Internet
item.description: First instance of me using this site as a bit of a blog, yay. Why not use Twitter? Reddit? Literally anything else? Oh boy, strap in.

item.title: Happy birthday, Penny!
item.description: This was a terrible post celebrating a friend’s birthday. I wiped it because it was terrible. I left the page here so the funny QR code still works.
